title: Siteimprove Accessibility Checker for Chrome
creator: Siteimprove
description: Built on the capabilities of the Siteimprove Intelligence Platform, the Siteimprove Accessibility Checker scans individual web pages for accessibility issues. The extension highlights issues on-page, provides clear explanations of how they affect users and recommendations on how to fix them.
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
<abbr title="Japanese Industry Standard">JIS</abbr>, Japanese industry standard
